title: Research Topic: Regulatory Enforcement Decline Under Obama
summary: Based on the research priority 'Regulatory Enforcement Decline Under Obama', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Investigation into the systematic decline in financial regulatory enforcement actions despite widespread fraud during the financial crisis. This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
